items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension to help you stay organized. Add tasks, set priorities, mark them as complete, clear your list, and export tasks to a CSV file—all with a simple, easy-to-use interface.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension to quickly shorten URLs from the active browser tab using the Bitly API. Automatically copies the shortened URL to the clipboard for easy sharing. Perfect for streamlining your browsing experience.

items.content_html: The Student Photo Extractor is a lightweight tool designed to fetch student photos directly from the GIET University ERP system using a structured URL pattern. By providing the roll number, the tool generates the appropriate link and retrieves the corresponding photo in real-time.
items.title: keshavsharma5118/photo-extractor: The Student Photo Extractor is a lightweight tool designed to fetch student photos directly from the GIET University ERP system using a structured URL pattern. By providing the roll number, the tool generates the appropriate link and retrieves the corresponding photo in real-time.
